SELECT bio.*, bir.encryptPhoneNumber,bir.phoneNumber,au.userName assessor,bre.regionName threadArea FROM business_information bio LEFT JOIN business_region bre on bre.id = bio.threadAreaId LEFT JOIN business_informer bir ON bio.informerId = bir.id LEFT JOIN auth_user au ON bio.validAssessorId = au.id
ORDER BY bio.createTime desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from business_information bio LEFT JOIN business_informer bir ON bio.informerId = bir.id LEFT JOIN auth_user au ON bio.validAssessorId = au.id
select COUNT(*) from business_information where state = #{state}
SELECT createTime, count(*) sum FROM business_information GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%M-%D') order by createTime asc

SELECT createTime, count(*) sum FROM business_information where (threadAreaId = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits} or acceptUnits = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%M-%D') order by createTime asc
SELECT count(*) validNumber FROM business_information WHERE state = 1 or state = 2 or state = 3 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%M-%D') order by createTime asc

SELECT count(*) validNumber FROM business_information WHERE (state = 1 or state = 2 or state = 3 ) and (threadAreaId = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits} or acceptUnits = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%M-%D') order by createTime asc

select count(*) from business_information bio LEFT JOIN business_informer bir ON bio.informerId = bir.id LEFT JOIN auth_user au ON bio.validAssessorId = au.id WHERE bio.state = 1 or bio.state = 2 or bio.state = 3

select COUNT(case when industryField = '1.国家政治安全' then industryField end ) as GJZZAQNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '2.基层政权' then industryField end ) as JCZQNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '3.宗族势力、村霸' then industryField end ) as ZZSLCBNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '4.征地、拆迁' then industryField end ) as ZDCQNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '5.建设工程、运输、矿产、渔业' then industryField end ) as JSGCNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '6.欺行霸市' then industryField end ) as QXBSNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '7.黄赌毒' then industryField end ) as HDDNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '8.非法高利放贷、暴力讨债' then industryField end ) as FFGLFDNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '9.插手民间纠纷' then industryField end ) as CSMJJFNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '10.境外黑社会' then industryField end) as JWHSHNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '11.盗掘古墓、倒卖走私文物' then industryField end) as DJGMNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '12.黑恶势力保护伞' then industryField end) as HESLBHSNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '13.垄断经营、逃税漏税、敲诈勒索' then industryField end) as LDJYNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '14.以经济发展、志愿慈善捐款为幌子从事非法活动' then industryField end) as JJFZNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '15.以公司、合作社等形式掩盖违法犯罪行为' then industryField end) as GSHZSNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '16.恐吓、滋扰、聚众造势等软暴力' then industryField end) as KHZRNumber, COUNT(case when industryField = '17.网络威胁、恐吓、侮辱诽谤、滋扰' then industryField end) as WLWXNumber from business_information where state >= 1 and (threadAreaId = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits} or acceptUnits = #{threadAreaIdAndAcceptUnits})
